hero.title: Changing the Game with {website.name}
hero.subtitle: We're revolutionizing how athletes, coaches, and teams analyze performance and engage with fans

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: {website.name} exists to help teams and athletes win through video analysis, data insights, and fan engagement tools. We believe technology should enhance—not complicate—the sports experience.

items.title: Video Analysis
items.description: Break down game film with our powerful tools that help coaches and athletes identify strengths and areas for improvement.

items.title: Performance Stats
items.description: Track and visualize key metrics with our advanced analytics dashboard to measure progress over time.

items.title: Fan Engagement
items.description: Connect with your community through live streams, highlights, and interactive content.

items.title: Global Reach
items.description: Used by teams in {primaryColor1}180+ countries{primaryColor1}, our platform connects the global sports community.

items.title: Easy Sharing
items.description: Quickly share clips and analysis with players, coaches, and recruiters with just a few clicks.

items.title: Automated Capture
items.description: Our smart cameras automatically record and tag key moments so you never miss important plays.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: The {website.name} team is made up of former athletes, coaches, and passionate technologists dedicated to improving sports through innovation.
